SEARCH
Package jpacman.controller

Interface IMonsterController

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractMonsterController, RandomMonsterMover
public interface IMonsterController
Interface for a controller which generates a monster move at regular intervals.

Version:
$Id: IMonsterController.java,v 1.3 2008/02/03 18:57:59 arie Exp $
Author:
Arie van Deursen, 3 September, 2003

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    doTick()
    Method that should be refined to conduct an actual monster move.
    void
    start()
    Start the timer.
    void
    stop()
    Stop the timer.

  • Method Details

    • start

      void start()
      Start the timer.

    • stop

      void stop()
      Stop the timer.

    • doTick

      void doTick()
      Method that should be refined to conduct an actual monster move. By default, nothing is done.
